setting.default-lock-status.name: Default lock status
setting.default-lock-status.desc: Set the default lock status when a Markdown or Components file is opened.
setting.save-follow-device.name: Save settings to current device
setting.save-follow-device.desc: Save settings to the device instead of data.json. Currently supports "Default lock status".
setting.show-title-bar-button.name: Show title bar button
setting.show-status-bar-button.name: Show status bar button
setting.register-in-more-options.name: Add control option in More options menu
setting.register-in-more-options.desc: Refers to the menu that appears when clicking the "More options" button in the top-right corner of the file.
setting.hide-official-lock-button.name: Hide the official Lock/Unlock button
setting.hide-official-lock-button.desc: Hide the official Lock/Unlock button in the top-right corner of the components file view.
log.workspace-leaf-id-cannot-access: Obsidian appears to have updated its internal API, and this plugin can no longer access the WorkspaceLeaf.id. Since the plugin relies on this identifier for proper memory cleanup, continued use may result in memory leaks. Please check for a plugin update or disable it until compatibility is restored.
